_sText:
Hello everyone!

So finally after over 2 months of hard work on this map, I've finally fixed it up and packed it in, and it's now ready for release. Thanks to Lost for helping me out with all my problems regarding this map. Couldn't have fixed them without him ^^ I created this map to learn new stuff and have a fun and creative experience, I've learned alot of new things, which makes me map faster than before :D

GG_Apartments

The map includes the following: - HDR. - Custom textures. - Custom model. - Light switches. - Displacements. - 3D Skybox. - 56 Spawn points. (28, CT & T) - Nodraw textures on unseen faces. - Prop_physics/static. - Breakable glass. - Hidden areas. - Custom radar Everything is implemented into the .BSP file using pakrat, so there is only a .BSP file :D For those who don't like to download the map without seeing it in action check out the youtube video I uploaded for ya! :D


I even mixed the song with some of the parts in the video, Enjoy!

So I hope you will like it and please host it on a server ^^ Let me know if you host it :P
